wikipedia_page.main: Richard Thomas Gough  (April-June 1859 – 2 February 1934) was an English Wales international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 1 match on 12 March 1883 against Scotland.

response: Richard Gough (born 1962) is a Scottish former football defender.
Richard Gough may also refer to:
* Richard Gough (Welsh footballer) (born 1860), Wales international footballer
* Richard Gough (1635–1723), the author of The History of Myddle
* Richard Gough (1655–1728), British merchant and politician
